biotools.summary: easyXpress is an R package to analyze and visualize high-throughput C. elegans microscopy data generated using CellProfiler. The package is rather specific to use in the Andersen Lab and, therefore, is not available from CRAN.

bioschemas.name: easyXpress
bioschemas.summary: easyXpress is an R package to analyze and visualize high-throughput C. elegans microscopy data generated using CellProfiler. The package is rather specific to use in the Andersen Lab and, therefore, is not available from CRAN.
